description: Mu ikingira, urushinge rukoreshwa ku muntu umwe gusa.
title: Mu ikingira, urushinge rukoreshwa ku muntu umwe gusa.
content:
Mu ikingira, urushinge rukoreshwa ku muntu umwe gusa. 
Gusangira urushinge bishobora kwanduzanya indwara.
Inkingo zose n’iyo zaba izo mu bihe by’ibiza, buri muntu wese agomba gukingizwa urushinge yihariye kandi rugakoreshwa rimwe gusa.
Ababyeyi n’abandi bita ku bana bagomba kubimenya no kubyubahiriza. Inshinge zakoreshe-jwe zigomba kujugunywa ahabigenewe.
